markdown:
Keysight Technologies Webinar
=============================

by [adminske](https://fke.utm.my/author/adminske/ "Posts by adminske")
 | Mar 6, 2021 | [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/keysight-technologies-webinar.jpeg)

Hello & Greeting!

Are you final semester student looking for a job opportunity? or you are the one still looking for an internship placement? Are you obsessed with the future of technology? ![🔌](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f50c.svg)![🎛](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f39b.svg)![📈](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f4c8.svg)

Good news! Every year Keysight Technologies hire hundreds of the best students worldwide for internships and full-time employment in software and hardware engineering, sales, marketing, customer service and more.

Keysight Technologies has collaborated with IEEE UTM Student Branch to organize a seminar. In this seminar, the company’s overview will be shared along with Graduate Trainee Program (GTP) and Internship Program.

Grab this chance by joining this seminar to find out more about the career possibilities!

![🗓](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f5d3.svg) Date: 20th April 2021, Tuesday  
![🕘](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f558.svg) Time: 02:30 p.m. – 03:30 p.m.  
![🏢](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f3e2.svg) Link: https://utm.webex.com/meet/mdkamal or scan the QR code

![📌](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/13.0.1/svg/1f4cc.svg) e-Certificate will be provided for IEEE members only.

See you there!
